name: Friendly Bomber (prototype)
description:
This is a small 2-player bomberman inspired game i've been working on as a prototype for a C++ game. The goal is to make the opponent fall into the lava.

Player 1 controls:

left - A | right - D | jump - W | drop bomb - Q | fire missile - E.

Player 2 controls:

left - "left" | right - "right" | jump - "up" | drop bomb - "shift" | fire missile - "ctrl".
